title: China in 70 years: Chinaâs annual passenger and freight traffic of railways and highways ranks first in the world
time_author: By He Zhuoyan (People's Daily Online)    14:36, May 20, 2019
content:
After decades of development, the annual passenger and freight traffic of railways and highways ranks first in the world.
	The data shows that the annual cargo throughput of the Yangtze River artery line reached 2.69 billion tons in 2018, ranking first in the world.
